DataElement.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Graft Infusion Procedure Occurrence Time Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unit of measure that represents standard time or daylight saving time the hematopoietic cell product (graft) was infused.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Graft Infusion Procedure Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)._Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body._A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Graft Infusion Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body.:A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Geographic local time without an offset for daylight saving time.

Concepts.definition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
